payload:
based on current python files and architecture.md file create a multi stage pipeline with nodejs mainly to solve the whole featureset as an ecosystem in a multi tenant dockerized scalabel solution that is easy to deploy and monitored properly. Also need to have admin interface where tenants can be managed

architectural requirements apart from the previous is: event based document processing is a must

tests: pass, lint: pass, typecheck: pass, audit: pass (pre-existing). Docker Compose: network isolation (3 networks), restart policies, health checks, log rotation, configurable env vars, Prisma migration entrypoint, worker scaling, .dockerignore, nginx proxy fix.

tests: 33/33 pass, lint: 0 errors (1 warn), typecheck: clean, audit: pre-existing only, coverage: 100% stmts, duplication: 1.92%. Built admin UI dashboard: login, dashboard, tenants CRUD, users CRUD, pipelines (upload/filter/detail), categories CRUD. Role-based routing. Production build OK (77KB gzip).

task-1770372444-d649: Monitoring - Add Prometheus metrics endpoint to API (prom-client), BullMQ worker metrics, prometheus.yml scrape config, Grafana provisioning (datasource + dashboard JSON). Backpressure checks all pass.

tests: 33/33 pass, typecheck: clean, lint: 0 errors, duplication: 2.16%. Implemented Prometheus metrics for API (http_requests_total, http_request_duration_seconds, pipelines_started_total) and workers (jobs_completed, jobs_failed, job_duration, active_jobs per stage). Added Grafana dashboard with 8 panels. Updated prometheus.yml to scrape workers. All objective tasks complete.

Objective complete. Multi-stage event-driven pipeline (pdf-extract → gemini-parse → categorize → similarity → category-split), Fastify API with JWT auth, React admin dashboard, Docker Compose orchestration (7 services), Prometheus+Grafana monitoring. All backpressure checks pass: 33/33 tests, typecheck clean, lint clean, all tasks closed.

## Reason
completed

All tasks completed successfully.
